metadata.title: CVE-2023-51781 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. atalk_ioctl innet/appletalk/ddp.c has a use-after-free because of an atalk_recvmsg racecondition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-51781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-223-generic - 4.15.0-223.235
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-223-generic - 4.15.0-223.235
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-223-lowlatency - 4.15.0-223.235
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-172-generic - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-172-lowlatency - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1150-kvm - 4.15.0-1150.155
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-223.235').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
